message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and this offer reflects that.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I understand your perspective, Bob, but $12,000 is my current bottom line. To make this work, I could meet you halfway at $10,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9,000?
